org.eclipse.viatra.addon.viewers.runtime.zest

Class ViatraGraphViewers

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.viatra.addon.viewers.runtime.zest.ViatraGraphViewers

  • public class ViatraGraphViewers
extends java.lang.Object
    API to bind the result of model queries to Zest GraphViewer widgets.

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public static void bind(org.eclipse.gef4.zest.core.viewers.GraphViewer viewer,
        ViewerState state)
        The basic bindings does not support isolated nodes but is more performant. If the graph contains isolated nodes, use bindWithIsolatedNodes(GraphViewer, ViewerState) instead.

        The basic bindings does not support isolated nodes but is more performant. If the graph contains isolated nodes, use bindWithIsolatedNodes(GraphViewer, ViewerState, boolean) instead.
